titleStmt.title: A practical discourse of silence and submission shewing that good men should possess their souls in patience under the severest providences : and particularly in the loss of dear relations : preached at St. Thomas's Hospital, Southwark / by William Hughes ...
titleStmt.author: Hughes, William, b. 1624 or 5.
